verses.text: Ay val ek' wach' lolonel t'a in pensar. Ol in b'itan t'a vinh rey yet' juntzanh in lolonel chi'. Ha in ti' lajan icha stz'ib'lab' junok mach te jelan stz'ib'ani.
Ach rey, a achnhej wach' ilji t'a yichanh masanil eb' vinh vinac. Te wach'nhej tas tzala', te jelan a loloni yujto syak'nhej swach'k'olal Dios t'a ib'anh.
Ak'och jachan q'uen espada t'a a nanhal, ach vinac te ak'um oval, te b'inajnac ach, te ay val elk'ochi.
Ixic t'a yib'anh nok' a chej yet' a poder yic tzak'an ganar oval, yic sb'oji yaj lolonel t'a stojolal t'a eb' emnaquil. Nivan tastac satub'tac ol a k'ulej yet' ipalil.
Ach co reyal, a jul-lab' te jay snhi' ol b'at ch'apnaj t'a snhi' sk'ool eb' ajk'ool. Yuj chi' ol telvoc eb' anima yic juntzanh chonhab' t'a skal oc.
Ach co Diosal, yajal ach t'a smasanil tiempo. Yajal ach, wach'nhej tz'aj a ch'olb'itan tastac.
Ha val tojolal scha a k'ool, max schalaj a k'ool chucal. Yuj chi' ix ach siq'uel Dios, aton a Diosal. Ix yak' niwan tzalajk'olal t'ayach t'a yichanh juntzanhxo eb' ay yopisio ed'oc.
Tz'el sjab' sperfumeal mirra, áloes yet' te' canela ayoch t'a a pichul. Ha son ay sch'anhal ol ak'an tzalaj a k'ool t'a a pat marfilnhej ayoch yelvanub'oc.
Ay eb' ix yisil eb' vinh rey t'a skal eb' avtab'il uuj. Ha t'a a tz'ey t'a a wach', ata' ayek' ix reina. Ha q'uen oro yelxo val wach' ayoch t'a spichul ix.
Ach yisil rey, maclej val ab'i, scham val ab'an tas ol val t'ayach. Manhxo a na eb' a k'ab' oc yet' eb' etchonhab',
yujto a vinh rey chi' snib'an swach'il ilji, aton vinh ajalil. Hak'uem a b'ha t'a vinh.
Ol yak' silab' eb' aj Tiro t'ayach. Ha eb' nivac b'eyum, ol snib'ej eb' yoch amigooc.
Tik sja ix ix van yoch yetb'eyumoc vinh rey, wach'nhej yilji ix, yisil pax ix junocxo vinh rey. Oro ayoch yelvanub'oc spichul ix.
Wach'nhej yaj sb'o ix yet' spichul, tz'ik'jib'at ix t'a vinh rey. Tzak'anoch eb' ix cob'estac yuk'levoc ix, aton eb' ix yamiga ix.
Stzalaj eb' ix sb'at eb' ix, masanto sk'och eb' ix t'a spat vinh rey chi'.
Ach rey, a eb' uninal ol em k'ojan b'aj tz'emtaxon k'ojan eb' a mam icham. Ol ak'anoch yopisio eb' yic syilan masanil yol a macb'en tik eb'.
Ha in ol vak' nachajcot a b'i yuj masanil anima toto ol aljoc t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik. Ol yal wach' lolonel junjun chonhab' t'ayach t'a masanil tiempo.
